Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool

Class BottomPanelGame

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.BottomPanelGame
public class BottomPanelGame
extends java.lang.Object
HBox object filled with all the necessary panels (ListView showing players in the game, Player panel, enemy or chest panel, roll-dice panel) for the game.
